mapper.select: SELECT PATNT_NM , PATNT_TELNO ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(PATNT_IDENTINO, 1, 1) IN ('0', '1', '2') THEN '20' || SUBSTR(PATNT_IDENTINO, 1, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(PATNT_IDENTINO, 3, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(PATNT_IDENTINO, 5, 2) ELSE '19' || SUBSTR(PATNT_IDENTINO, 1, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(PATNT_IDENTINO, 3, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(PATNT_IDENTINO, 5, 2) END AS PATNT_IDENTINO FROM PATIENT

SELECT M.MSG_CODE, M.MSG_REC, D.FORM, M.MSG_INS_DATE, P.PATNT_NM "patient.patntNm" FROM MESSAGE M INNER JOIN MESSAGE_DTL D ON(M.FORM_CODE = D.FORM_CODE) INNER JOIN PATIENT P ON(M.MSG_REC = P.PATNT_TELNO) ORDER BY M.MSG_INS_DATE DESC

SELECT PATNT_NM , PATNT_TELNO ,TO_CHAR( CASE WHEN SUBSTR(PATNT_IDENTINO, 1, 2) BETWEEN '69' AND '99' THEN TO_DATE('19' || SUBSTR(PATNT_IDENTINO, 1, 6), 'YYYYMMDD') ELSE TO_DATE('20' || SUBSTR(PATNT_IDENTINO, 1, 6), 'YYYYMMDD') END, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) AS PATNT_IDENTINO FROM PATIENT WHERE PATNT_NM LIKE '%' || #{patntNm} || '%'
